title: Search Spaces for mlr3
text: Package website: release | dev mlr3tuningspaces collection search spaces hyperparameter optimization mlr3 ecosystem. features ready--use search spaces many popular machine learning algorithms. search spaces scientific articles work wide range data sets. Currently, offer tuning spaces three publications.

title: Search Spaces for mlr3
text: several sections hyperparameter optimization mlr3book. Getting started book section mlr3tuningspaces. Learn search space.

title: Search Spaces for mlr3
text: Install last release CRAN: Install development version GitHub:

title: Search Spaces for mlr3
text: learner passed lts() function arguments learner default tuning space Bischl et al. (2023).
code: library(mlr3tuningspaces)  learner = lts(lrn("classif.rpart"))  # tune learner on pima data set instance = tune(   tnr("random_search"),   task = tsk("pima"),   learner = learner,   resampling = rsmp("holdout"),   measure = msr("classif.ce"),   term_evals = 10 )  # best performing hyperparameter configuration instance$result ##          cp minbucket minsplit learner_param_vals  x_domain classif.ce ## 1: -2.50293  3.110378  1.83171          <list[4]> <list[3]>  0.2148438

title: Search Spaces for mlr3
text: mlr_tuning_spaces dictionary contains tuning spaces. key passed lts() function returns TuningSpace. Get learner tuning space.
code: library("data.table")  # print keys and tuning spaces as.data.table(mlr_tuning_spaces) tuning_space = lts("classif.rpart.rbv2") tuning_space ## <TuningSpace:classif.rpart.rbv2>: Classification Rpart with RandomBot ##           id lower upper levels logscale ## 1:        cp 1e-04     1 [NULL]     TRUE ## 2:  maxdepth 1e+00    30 [NULL]    FALSE ## 3: minbucket 1e+00   100 [NULL]    FALSE ## 4:  minsplit 1e+00   100 [NULL]    FALSE tuning_space$get_learner() ## <LearnerClassifRpart:classif.rpart>: Classification Tree ## * Model: - ## * Parameters: cp=<RangeTuneToken>, maxdepth=<RangeTuneToken>, minbucket=<RangeTuneToken>, ##   minsplit=<RangeTuneToken>, xval=0 ## * Packages: mlr3, rpart ## * Predict Types:  [response], prob ## * Feature Types: logical, integer, numeric, factor, ordered ## * Properties: importance, missings, multiclass, selected_features, twoclass, weights

title: Search Spaces for mlr3
text: Tuning spaces can applied learners pipeline.
code: library(mlr3pipelines)  # set default tuning space graph_learner = as_learner(po("subsample") %>>%   lts(lrn("classif.rpart")))  # set rbv2 tuning space tuning_space = lts("classif.rpart.rbv2") graph_learner$graph$pipeops$classif.rpart$param_set$set_values(.values = tuning_space$values)

title: Search Spaces for mlr3
text: looking forward new collections tuning spaces peer-reviewed articles. can suggest new tuning spaces issue contribute new collection pull request. Take look already implemented collection e.g. default tuning spaces Bischl et al. (2023). TuningSpace added mlr_tuning_spaces dictionary add_tuning_space() function. Create tuning space variant learner e.g. LearnerClassifRpart LearnerRegrRpart. Choose name related publication adjust documentation. reference added bibentries.R file happy help pull request questions.
code: vals = list(   minsplit  = to_tune(2, 64, logscale = TRUE),   cp        = to_tune(1e-04, 1e-1, logscale = TRUE) )  add_tuning_space(   id = "classif.rpart.example",   values = vals,   tags = c("default", "classification"),   learner = "classif.rpart",   label = "Classification Tree Example" ) bischl_2021 = bibentry("misc",   key           = "bischl_2021",   title         = "Hyperparameter Optimization: Foundations, Algorithms, Best Practices and Open Challenges",   author        = "Bernd Bischl and Martin Binder and Michel Lang and Tobias Pielok and Jakob Richter and Stefan Coors and Janek Thomas and Theresa Ullmann and Marc Becker and Anne-Laure Boulesteix and Difan Deng and Marius Lindauer",   year          = "2021",   eprint        = "2107.05847",   archivePrefix = "arXiv",   primaryClass  = "stat.ML",   url           = "https://arxiv.org/abs/2107.05847" )

title: Tuning Spaces — TuningSpace
text: class defines tuning space hyperparameter tuning. tuning, important create search space defines range hyperparameters tuned. TuningSpace object consists search spaces peer-reviewed articles work well wide range data sets. $values field stores list paradox::TuneToken define search space. tokens can assigned $values slot learner's paradox::ParamSet. learner tuned, tokens used create search space.

title: Tuning Spaces — TuningSpace
text: .data.table.TuningSpace(x) Returns tabular view tuning space. TuningSpace -> data.table::data.table() x (TuningSpace)

title: Tuning Spaces — TuningSpace
text: id (character(1)) Identifier object. values (list()) List paradox::TuneToken describe tuning space fixed parameter values. tags (character()) Arbitrary tags group filter tuning space e.g. "classification" "regression". learner (character(1))mlr3::Learner tuning space. package (character(1)) Packages provide mlr3::Learner, e.g. mlr3learners learner mlr3learners::LearnerClassifRanger interfaces ranger package. label (character(1)) Label object. Can used tables, plot text output instead ID. man (character(1)) String format [pkg]::[topic] pointing manual page object. referenced help package can opened via method $help().

title: Tuning Spaces — TuningSpace
text: TuningSpace$new() TuningSpace$get_learner() TuningSpace$format() TuningSpace$help() TuningSpace$print() TuningSpace$clone()

title: Tuning Spaces — TuningSpace
text: Creates new instance R6 class.

title: Tuning Spaces — TuningSpace
code: TuningSpace$new(   id,   values,   tags,   learner,   package = character(),   label = NA_character_,   man = NA_character_ )

title: Tuning Spaces — TuningSpace
text: id (character(1)) Identifier new instance. values (list()) List paradox::TuneToken describe tuning space fixed parameter values. tags (character()) Tags group filter tuning spaces e.g. "classification" "regression". learner (character(1))mlr3::Learner tuning space. package (character()) Packages provide mlr3::Learner, e.g. mlr3learners learner mlr3learners::LearnerClassifRanger interfaces ranger package. label (character(1)) Label new instance. Can used tables, plot text output instead ID. man (character(1)) String format [pkg]::[topic] pointing manual page new instance. referenced help package can opened via method $help().

text: Returns learner paradox::TuneToken set parameter set.

title: Tuning Spaces — TuningSpace
code: library(mlr3tuning)  # Get default tuning space of rpart learner tuning_space = lts("classif.rpart.default")  # Set tuning space learner = lrn("classif.rpart") learner$param_set$values = tuning_space$values  # Tune learner instance = tune(   tnr("random_search"),   task = tsk("pima"),   learner = learner,   resampling = rsmp ("holdout"),   measure = msr("classif.ce"),   term_evals = 10)  instance$result #>           cp minbucket minsplit learner_param_vals  x_domain classif.ce #>        <num>     <num>    <num>             <list>    <list>      <num> #> 1: -3.619915  3.851142 3.505744          <list[3]> <list[3]>  0.2148438  library(mlr3pipelines)  # Set tuning space in a pipeline graph_learner = as_learner(po("subsample") %>>%   lts(lrn("classif.rpart")))

what: Syntactic Sugar for Tuning Space Construction — lts
title: Syntactic Sugar for Tuning Space Construction — lts
text: Function retrieve TuningSpace objects mlr_tuning_spaces , allows mlr3::Learner directly configured search space. function belongs mlr3::mlr_sugar family.

title: Syntactic Sugar for Tuning Space Construction — lts
code: lts(x, ...)  # S3 method for class 'missing' lts(x, ...)  # S3 method for class 'character' lts(x, ...)  # S3 method for class 'Learner' lts(x, ...)  ltss(x)

title: Syntactic Sugar for Tuning Space Construction — lts
text: x (character() | mlr3::Learner) character, key passed dictionary retrieve tuning space. mlr3::Learner, default tuning space added learner. ... (named list paradox::TuneToken | NULL) Pass paradox::TuneToken add overwrite parameters tuning space. Use NULL remove parameters (see examples).

title: Syntactic Sugar for Tuning Space Construction — lts
text: TuningSpace x character(). mlr3::Learner x mlr3::Learner. list objects ltss() function. missing, mlr_tuning_spaces dictionary character, TuningSpace mlr3::Learner, mlr3::Learner paradox::TuneToken list(), list TuningSpace mlr3::Learner

title: Syntactic Sugar for Tuning Space Construction — lts
code: # load tuning space lts("classif.rpart.default") #> <TuningSpace:classif.rpart.default>: Classification Rpart with Default #>           id lower upper levels logscale #>       <char> <num> <num> <list>   <lgcl> #> 1:  minsplit 2e+00 128.0 [NULL]     TRUE #> 2: minbucket 1e+00  64.0 [NULL]     TRUE #> 3:        cp 1e-04   0.1 [NULL]     TRUE  # load tuning space and add parameter lts("classif.rpart.default", maxdepth = to_tune(1, 15)) #> <TuningSpace:classif.rpart.default>: Classification Rpart with Default #>           id lower upper levels logscale #>       <char> <num> <num> <list>   <lgcl> #> 1:  minsplit 2e+00 128.0 [NULL]     TRUE #> 2: minbucket 1e+00  64.0 [NULL]     TRUE #> 3:        cp 1e-04   0.1 [NULL]     TRUE #> 4:  maxdepth 1e+00  15.0 [NULL]    FALSE  # load tuning space and remove parameter lts("classif.rpart.default", minsplit = NULL) #> <TuningSpace:classif.rpart.default>: Classification Rpart with Default #>           id lower upper levels logscale #>       <char> <num> <num> <list>   <lgcl> #> 1: minbucket 1e+00  64.0 [NULL]     TRUE #> 2:        cp 1e-04   0.1 [NULL]     TRUE  # load tuning space and overwrite parameter lts("classif.rpart.default", minsplit = to_tune(32, 128)) #> <TuningSpace:classif.rpart.default>: Classification Rpart with Default #>           id   lower upper levels logscale #>       <char>   <num> <num> <list>   <lgcl> #> 1:  minsplit 32.0000 128.0 [NULL]    FALSE #> 2: minbucket  1.0000  64.0 [NULL]     TRUE #> 3:        cp  0.0001   0.1 [NULL]     TRUE  # load learner and apply tuning space in one go lts(lrn("classif.rpart")) #> <LearnerClassifRpart:classif.rpart>: Classification Tree #> * Model: - #> * Parameters: cp=<RangeTuneToken>, minbucket=<RangeTuneToken>, #>   minsplit=<RangeTuneToken>, xval=0 #> * Packages: mlr3, rpart #> * Predict Types:  [response], prob #> * Feature Types: logical, integer, numeric, factor, ordered #> * Properties: importance, missings, multiclass, selected_features, #>   twoclass, weights  # load learner, overwrite parameter and apply tuning space lts(lrn("classif.rpart"), minsplit = to_tune(32, 128)) #> <LearnerClassifRpart:classif.rpart>: Classification Tree #> * Model: - #> * Parameters: cp=<RangeTuneToken>, minbucket=<RangeTuneToken>, #>   minsplit=<RangeTuneToken>, xval=0 #> * Packages: mlr3, rpart #> * Predict Types:  [response], prob #> * Feature Types: logical, integer, numeric, factor, ordered #> * Properties: importance, missings, multiclass, selected_features, #>   twoclass, weights  # load multiple tuning spaces ltss(c("classif.rpart.default", "classif.ranger.default")) #> [[1]] #> <TuningSpace:classif.rpart.default>: Classification Rpart with Default #>           id lower upper levels logscale #>       <char> <num> <num> <list>   <lgcl> #> 1:  minsplit 2e+00 128.0 [NULL]     TRUE #> 2: minbucket 1e+00  64.0 [NULL]     TRUE #> 3:        cp 1e-04   0.1 [NULL]     TRUE #>  #> [[2]] #> <TuningSpace:classif.ranger.default>: Classification Ranger with Default #>                 id lower upper levels logscale #>             <char> <num> <num> <list>   <lgcl> #> 1:      mtry.ratio   0.0     1 [NULL]    FALSE #> 2:         replace    NA    NA [NULL]    FALSE #> 3: sample.fraction   0.1     1 [NULL]    FALSE #> 4:       num.trees   1.0  2000 [NULL]    FALSE #>

title: Dictionary of Tuning Spaces — mlr_tuning_spaces
text: simple mlr3misc::Dictionary storing objects class TuningSpace. tuning space associated help page, see mlr_tuning_spaces_[id].

title: Dictionary of Tuning Spaces — mlr_tuning_spaces
text: R6::R6Class object inheriting mlr3misc::Dictionary.

title: Dictionary of Tuning Spaces — mlr_tuning_spaces
text: See mlr3misc::Dictionary.

title: Dictionary of Tuning Spaces — mlr_tuning_spaces
text: .data.table(dict, ..., objects = FALSE)mlr3misc::Dictionary -> data.table::data.table() Returns data.table::data.table() fields "key", "label", "learner", "n_values" columns. objects set TRUE, constructed objects returned list column named object.

title: mlr3tuningspaces 0.5.0
text: CRAN release: 2024-03-05 fix: Reduce levels respect.unordered.factors search space ranger.rbv1 "ignore" "order". compatibility: Work new paradox version 1.0.0

title: mlr3tuningspaces 0.4.0
text: CRAN release: 2023-04-20 fix: source rbv2 search spaces wrong. source Binder, Pfisterer, Bischl (2020). Thanks @markus-schaffer. feat: Add rbv1 search spaces Kühn (2018) paper.

title: mlr3tuningspaces 0.3.5
text: CRAN release: 2023-03-08 fix: Add missing ... parameter rd_info.TuningSpace().

title: mlr3tuningspaces 0.3.4
text: CRAN release: 2023-03-02 docs: Remove deprecated method argument mlr3tuning::tune(). docs: Update resources.

title: mlr3tuningspaces 0.3.3
text: CRAN release: 2022-12-07 fix: Extra paradox::TuneToken lts() passed learners created $get_learner(). docs: Add lts() return.

title: mlr3tuningspaces 0.3.1

title: mlr3tuningspaces 0.3.0
text: CRAN release: 2022-06-28 feat: Pass paradox::TuneToken lts() add, remove overwrite parameters tuning spaces learners. fix: Remove debugging lts().

title: mlr3tuningspaces 0.2.0
text: CRAN release: 2022-04-12 feat: Add .data.table.TuningSpace() function. feat: TuningSpace objects optional field $label now. feat: New $help() method opens manual page TuningSpace. feat: Add search space glmnet kknn default collection. feat: New as_search_space() function create search spaces TuningSpace objects.

title: mlr3tuningspaces 0.1.1
text: CRAN release: 2022-01-19 fix: subsample hyperparameter tuned logarithmic scale now. lower bound alpha reduced 1e-4 1e-3. tuning range lambda hyperparameter 0.1 1. now , lambda tuned 1e-3 1e3 logarithmic scale.

title: mlr3tuningspaces 0.1.0
text: CRAN release: 2022-01-03 refactor: update citations. feat: Add mtry.ratio hyperparameter tuning spaces ranger learner. feat: Add $print() method TuningSpace objects.

title: mlr3tuningspaces 0.0.1
text: CRAN release: 2021-07-16 First release tuning spaces package.
